tasks.label: Ruff the whole project
tasks.command: uv run ruff check --select I --fix . && uv run ruff format .

tasks.label: Ruff the current file
tasks.command: uv run ruff check --fix "${file}" && uv run ruff format "${file}"

tasks.label: Coverage Report
tasks.command: uv run coverage run --omit=tests/* -m pytest && uv run coverage html && uv run coverage erase
